title: Prime land near Kandy expressway interchange on Colombo - Kurunegala highway
details: Two acres barren paddy land facing East with 310 feet road frontage to Kurunegala-Colombo Highway; only 500 Meters away from Colombo-Kandy express way interchange near Pothuhera. Reachable from Colombo within 30 minutes once the Colombo-Kandy highway has been completed. Suitable for a hotel complex, vehicle yard, storage facility, or any industry. Panoramic views of mountains and paddy fields. Single owner and clear title deeds. Contact via email or by phone.
